Class ViewHotelController

java.lang.Object
ViewHotelController
public class ViewHotelController extends Object
The ViewHotelController class is responsible for handling the actions and interactions in the View Hotel view of the hotel management system. It connects the ViewHotelView and MainView with the hotel data.

      public ViewHotelController(ViewHotelView viewHotelView, MainView mainView, Hotels myHotels)
      Constructs a ViewHotelController with the specified view and model components.
      Parameters:
      viewHotelView - The ViewHotelView object representing the view for displaying hotel information.
      mainView - The MainView object representing the main view of the application.
      myHotels - The Hotels object containing the list of hotels.

      Initializes the inquire view by setting up the exit button listener.
      Parameters:
      inquire - The Inquire object representing the view for detailed hotel inquiries.

    • DisplayHotelInformation

      private void DisplayHotelInformation(Inquire inquire, Hotel hotel)
      Displays high-level hotel information, such as the number of booked and available rooms, for a given hotel.
      Parameters:
      inquire - The Inquire object for displaying hotel information.
      hotel - The Hotel object containing the hotel's data.

    • DisplayRoomInformation

      private void DisplayRoomInformation(Inquire inquire, Hotel hotel)
      Displays detailed room information, including available dates, for a selected room in the given hotel.
      Parameters:
      inquire - The Inquire object for displaying room information.
      hotel - The Hotel object containing the hotel's data.
